author: Ultimate_Bricks
title: Great Bat Signal
review:
This small polybag has only 41 pieces but, manages to do an amazing job a creating a nice bat signal build.

Build

The bat signal can rotate a full 360 degrees from the base, the top can move up and down smoothly. The colors are mainly dark bluish gray and light bluish gray with a little bit of black. The main signal part has a large dome piece in trans black, inside of it there is a bat logo printed tile.

Minifigure

The one figure is just your average Batman with a yellow belt a black batarang and a soft cape, still cool though.

Conclusion

This is a very cool polybag but, I don't think it is worth spending a lot of money on because it has common parts and a common minifigure. In the end, I hope this review was helpful and informative.

author: Courage
title: Good value if a little rare
review:
These were originally a pain to get in the UK as no Lego Stores actually did the scavenger hunt, but now The Entertainer are selling them £4 a pop. It's not for free, but it's the only time I've ever seen one of these things physically.

The set comes with a Batman Minifig, a Bat Signal, sticker sheet and poster.

The Batman minifig is standard affair, no unique parts but it's nice to be able to get a Batman Movie version this cheap, with a Batarang and included small build.

The small build being a Bat Signal, which is an excellent extra for a polybag. It's a nice looking build with a lot of useful pieces, The Bat Logo print on a round 2x2 especially. It's also an interesting choice as another Bat Signal (albeit a much simpler one) is included in the GCPD accsessory pack, but this one is overall much nicer designed. (There's also a third one included in the Ultimate Bat Signal... Incase you REALLY want Batman's attention.) A base is even included to easily attach to a roof of a building.

There's also a poster and sticker sheet. They're alright, kids will like them. I only wish the logos were the same size as a round 2x2 essentially getting 3 other logos.

Great value overall, it's like a CMF but for an extra pound you get a nice build. And other things.
